Name: Storm Tale 2
About the game: Sharpen your sword and take up your bow - itâ€™s time to fight back a powerful sorcerer and his mighty dragon. Join Griffri, the wizard, on a quest to not only rebuild his village, but to put an end to the perilous reign of evil that threatens the realm. Bring the peace back to this fabulous land. Are you ready for an adventure?
